metadata.title: CVE-2024-10466 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: By sending a specially crafted push message, a remote server could havehung the parent process, causing the browser to become unresponsive. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Thunderbird <128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
